Setting up custom classes¶

class AFprep_func.classes.Domain(num, start, end, domain_type)¶

Bases: object

class AFprep_func.classes.Protein(name, accession_id, sequence, domain_list=None, fragment_list=None)¶

Bases: object

add_domain(domain)¶

Adds a Domain instance to the protein’s domain list.

Parameters: - domain (Domain): The Domain instance to be added.

add_fragment(start, end)¶

Adds a fragment to the protein’s fragment list. Ensures that the fragment’s start and end positions are positive integers and that the start is less than or equal to the end. Also checks for continuity with the last fragment added.

Parameters: - start (int): The start position of the fragment in the protein sequence. Must be > 0. - end (int): The end position of the fragment in the protein sequence. Must be >= start.
